abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32609942, pmid32604413, pmid32611761, pmid32621738, pmid32573950, pmid32622040, pmid32613681, pmid32621992, pmid32595812, pmid32621881, pmid32621858, pmid32621497, pmid32605363, pmid32613877, pmid32602604, pmid32621616, pmid32622032, pmid32568102, pmid32609310, pmid32621859, pmid32621869, pmid32609924, pmid32603297, pmid32609925, pmid32614996, pmid32614768, pmid32609906, pmid32614767, pmid32614640
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.07
